description: site description assigned from Texas Ecological Laboratory and Braun & Gresham, PLLC.
site latitude, rounded to two decimal places for property anonymity
site longitude, rounded to two decimal places for property anonymity
site elevation
year of sampling effort
date (mm/dd/yy) of leaf and soil collections
leaf id
species code per USDA NRCS PLANTS database
photosynthetic pathway (C3 or C4)
species growth duration (annual or perennial)
ability to associate with symbiotic nitrogen fixing bacteria (yes = N-fixer, no = non-fixer)
plant functional group (c3_nonfixer, c4_nonfixer, c3_fixer)
leaf nitrogen content per unit leaf dry biomass
leaf carbon content per unit leaf dry biomass
fresh leaf area
dry leaf biomass
leaf mass per unit leaf area
leaf nitrogen content per unit leaf area
ratio of leaf carbon content (c.mass) to leaf nitrogen content (n.mass)
Ratio of leaf intercellular CO2 to atmospheric CO2 (referenced as leaf Ci:Ca)
unit cost of acquiring and using nitrogen relative to water
